queryMap.query: SELECT CD RACER_PERIO_NO FROM TBDM_SPEC_CD WHERE GRP_CD = 'D10000' ORDER BY CD DESC
SELECT CAND_NO ,NM_KOR FROM TBDN_CAND_IDENT WHERE RACER_PERIO_NO = ? AND NVL(DEL_YN,'N') = 'N' -- 미삭제 AND TH_STAT NOT IN ('004','005') -- 퇴소,휴학제외 ORDER BY CAND_NO

SELECT '제 '|| A.RACER_PERIO_NO ||' - '|| TRIM(TO_CHAR(A.ISSUE_NO,'009')) AS ISSUE_NM, A.RACER_PERIO_NO, A.ISSUE_NO, A.ISSUE_DT, A.CAND_NO, B.NM_KOR, A.USE_PRPS, A.ETC, A.INST_ID, A.INST_DTM, A.UPDT_ID, A.UPDT_DTM, A.PRINT_YN AS PRINT_YN, B.BIRTH, (substr(B.POST_NO,0,3)||' - '||substr(B.POST_NO,3,3)) AS POST_NO, B.ADDR1 ||' '|| B.ADDR2 AS ADDR, '0' CHK FROM TBDN_BLNG_CERT A, TBDN_CAND_IDENT B WHERE A.CAND_NO = B.CAND_NO AND A.RACER_PERIO_NO = B.RACER_PERIO_NO AND A.RACER_PERIO_NO LIKE ?||'%' AND B.NM_KOR LIKE ?||'%' ORDER BY A.ISSUE_NO
SELECT '제 '|| ? ||' - '|| TRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(MAX(ISSUE_NO), 0) + 1, '009')) AS ISSUE_NM, NVL(MAX(ISSUE_NO), 0) + 1 ISSUE_NO FROM TBDN_BLNG_CERT WHERE RACER_PERIO_NO = ?
SELECT MIN(DT) AS EDU_STR_DT ,MAX(DT) AS EDU_END_DT FROM TBDN_DETL_EDU_ASSIGN WHERE RACER_PERIO_NO = ?

INSERT INTO TBDN_BLNG_CERT ( RACER_PERIO_NO, ISSUE_NO, ISSUE_DT, CAND_NO, USE_PRPS, ETC, INST_ID, INST_DTM ) VALUES ( ?, --RACER_PERIO_NO, (SELECT NVL(MAX(ISSUE_NO)+1,1) SEQ FROM TBDN_BLNG_CERT WHERE RACER_PERIO_NO = ?), --ISSUE_NO, ?, --ISSUE_DT, ?, --CAND_NO, ?, --USE_PRPS, ?, --ETC, ?, --INST_ID, SYSDATE --INST_DTM )
UPDATE TBDN_BLNG_CERT SET ISSUE_DT = ?, CAND_NO = ?, USE_PRPS = ?, ETC = ?, UPDT_ID = ? , UPDT_DTM = SYSDATE WHERE RACER_PERIO_NO = ? AND ISSUE_NO = ? AND PRINT_YN = 'N'
UPDATE TBDN_BLNG_CERT SET PRINT_YN ='Y' WHERE RACER_PERIO_NO = ? AND ISSUE_NO = ?
DELETE FROM TBDN_BLNG_CERT WHERE RACER_PERIO_NO = ? AND ISSUE_NO = ? AND PRINT_YN = 'N'
